text: Captain Marvel is a 2019 American superhero movie based on Marvel Comics, featuring the character Carol Danvers / Captain Marvel. Produced by Marvel Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures. The movie starring by Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Lee Pace, and much more. A sequel called The Marvels, was released on November 10, 2023. title: Captain Marvel (movie)
